about_the_game:
The Decaying Earth Guide is a narrative-driven, multi-ending third-person zombie shooter built with Unreal Engine 5.

Beneath layers of foreshadowing, your choices unlock entirely different story branches and endings.

Step into a post-pandemic world where reality, ideals, and romance converge into a story uniquely yours.

About the Demo

The full version of the game includes four chapters. The first chapter will be released as a free Demo.

Background

2026: A major energy company is exposed for hiding nuclear contamination from seabed mining.

2028: Mutated parasitic outbreaks are reported among monkey populations on tropical islands, linked to contaminated seawater.

2029: Humanity devises three solutions—Genetic Engineering, Armed Eradication, and Aerospace Migration—each faction acting independently.

2032: Your city faces an uncontrollable outbreak overnight.

Gameplay

Follow a linear progression in third-person perspective, countering over ten zombie types through various playstyles:

  • Direct Combat: Engage enemies head-on with the dismemberment system and immersive hit feedback.

  • Stealth Assassination: Use tools and environmental elements to silently eliminate threats.

  • Parkour Style: With Unreal Engine’s motion-matching system, enjoy seamless parkour and fluid vaulting. Pair it with bullet-time skills to perform cinematic moves at any moment.

Game Scenes

Travel through richly designed locations, from traditional Chinese alleys and gardens to space launch bases, laboratories, and the vastness of space.

The game will also feature fantastical environments, along with diverse gameplay modes and character options.

Story

Play as James, an aerospace scientist and a key member of the Aerospace Migration faction—a brave yet vulnerable character. Alongside your lover, Jasmine, you must confront the zombie crisis and embark on a perilous interstellar escape.

Spanning just four in-game days, the gripping storyline unfolds from the outbreak to the final escape into space. Your emotional choices shape distinct and dramatically different endings.

This game is dedicated to using its narrative and presentation to make a zombie shooter more than just a screen filled with blood and gore. Instead, it uses the game as a medium to provide players with an aesthetic experience:

A depiction of individual experiences in the apocalypse, the tension and release of human relationships and emotions, and the exploration of the romance in interstellar escape.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes scenes of shooting zombies,dismemberment, and blood splatter.

short_description: Did you dream of being an astronaut? After a nuclear wastewater crisis, Earth splits into three factions. As a Space Agency astronomer, will you escape to the stars with your beloved or face the storm? Shape your destiny and craft your own Guide to Escaping a Decaying Earth.

English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
